column4: Neasden Jn – Acton Canal Wharf Jn
column16: R1 5 mph on the Up road only at Bridge No.10 at 7m 61ch between Acton Canal Wharf Jn and Neasden Jn. S1 8' 6" high by 8' wide containers can be conveyed on FRA wagons, Deck height 990mm. 8' 6" high by 8' 2.5" wide containers may be conveyed on 825mm bed height Megafrets
